backend/main.mo: Defines the actor’s core domain types for products, listings, retailers, applications, and analytics, serving as the backend data model. Contains no functional logic beyond type declarations.
backend/migration.mo: Provides a migration function converting old listings into a new format by adding promo fields and setting updatedAt to createdAt. Returns an updated actor state with transformed listing entries.
feature_evidence.json: Contains feature evidence records mapping feature IDs to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs. Used for tracking implementation coverage and confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Lists pre-generated summaries for numerous frontend files, describing their roles, styling updates, and behavior. Functions as a reference index for existing frontend components.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind CSS variables for light and dark themes using OKLCH values. Applies base styling and sets theme-driven color tokens.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app at #root and loading main.tsx. Sets metadata and page title.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Wraps the app in error handling, theme provider, cart provider, and router. Also mounts the global toast system.
frontend/src/components/admin/DangerZone: Empty placeholder file for an admin danger‑zone system wipe card component.
frontend/src/components/admin/ListingEdi: Modal dialog for creating and editing listings with full promo configuration, validation, and integration with listing-related backend hooks. Loads product and retailer data, manages form state, and triggers create/update/promo actions.
frontend/src/components/admin/ProductEdi: Dialog for creating or editing a product, including fields, image upload, validation, and category management.
frontend/src/components/admin/RetailerEd: Dialog for creating or editing a retailer with contact info, location, and opening hours, including validation and submission.
frontend/src/components/admin/RetailerHo: Editor for weekly opening hours and holiday overrides, allowing toggling days, adjusting times, and managing holiday entries.
frontend/src/components/admin/Searchable: Searchable dropdown select component using a popover with filterable options.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminOnly.t: Wrapper displaying a destructive alert indicating admin backend functionality is not yet implemented.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthInitial: Overlay showing login or actor initialization progress during authentication.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button handling Internet Identity authentication state and errors.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Dialog informing users that profile setup functionality is not yet implemented.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAdmi: Guard component blocking access for non-admin users and showing an access denied message.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAppr: Guard component requiring user approval, with admin bypass and approval request UI.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Guard requiring user authentication, showing login prompt when not logged in.
frontend/src/components/brand/BrandImage: Image component with error handling that swaps to themed fallback placeholders when loading fails.
frontend/src/components/errors/GlobalErr: React error boundary that captures runtime and promise errors and displays a recovery screen.
frontend/src/components/errors/Unexpecte: UI screen showing error details with options to reload or navigate home.
frontend/src/components/shop/cart/CartPr: Context provider managing cart items with localStorage sync and utility helpers.
frontend/src/components/shop/catalog/use: Hook providing search, category filtering, and sorting for catalogue items.
frontend/src/components/shop/CataloguePr: Empty file placeholder for catalogue preview section.
Footer showing copyright info and a referral link with gradient styling.
Responsive shop header with navigation, cart badge, authentication controls, and mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/shop/ShopLanding: Empty file placeholder for shop landing hero section.
Layout wrapper combining header, footer, auth overlay, and optional default-town setup.
frontend/src/components/towns/DefaultTow: Dialog prompting users to select and save a default town with async mutation handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook creating and caching an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshing dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useBootstrapAdmin.ts: Empty file placeholder for admin bootstrap logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useCatalog.ts: Hook fetching the global product catalogue via the backend actor using react-query.
frontend/src/hooks/useCategories.ts: Provides hooks to list and create categories, merging frequent preset categories with backend data using React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/useEnsureDefaultTownO: Auto-assigns 'Osizweni' as the default town for authenticated users lacking one, falling back to manual selection if unavailable or failing.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Defines an Internet Identity context and provider managing authentication, identity loading, login, logout, and related state.
frontend/src/hooks/useListings.ts: Implements listing CRUD hooks and queries, including filtering by retailer or id, and invalidates related caches after mutations.
frontend/src/hooks/useNomaYini.ts: Empty placeholder file with no implementation.
frontend/src/hooks/useOrders.ts: Provides hooks to list user orders, fetch individual orders, and create new orders with delivery and payment method handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useProducts.ts: Contains product listing, retrieval, creation, and update hooks, with cache invalidation for products, catalog, and categories.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Exposes approval and admin-related queries and mutations, including checking approval status and setting user approvals.
frontend/src/hooks/useRetailerPortal.ts: Adds retailer-portal queries for fetching the retailer profile, inventory, and orders tied to the authenticated retailer.
frontend/src/hooks/useRetailers.ts: Provides React Query hooks for listing, retrieving, creating, updating, and deleting retailers via an actor API.
frontend/src/hooks/useRoleApplications.t: Empty placeholder file for role application hooks.
frontend/src/hooks/useTownMembership.ts: Defines React Query hooks and keys for town membership operations, all currently using unimplemented backend methods.
frontend/src/hooks/useTowns.ts: Includes types and React Query hooks for listing, creating, updating, and removing towns, but all backend calls are placeholders.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfiles.ts: Implements placeholder user profile query/mutation hooks with React Query, pending backend support.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark theme variables and base styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entrypoint setting up React, React Query, Internet Identity provider, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDriversPag: Empty placeholder page for admin driver management.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminManageList: Admin UI for viewing, filtering, creating, editing, and deleting product listings using retailer and product data.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminPickupPoin: Empty placeholder page for admin pickup point management.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminProductsPa: Admin UI for browsing, searching, creating, and editing products in the global catalogue.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminRetailersP: UI for listing, searching, creating, editing, and deleting retailers with dialogs and search filtering.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminShoppersPa: Empty placeholder file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminTownApplic: Admin interface for approving or rejecting additional town membership applications using placeholder data.
Admin page to list, create, edit, and remove towns with form handling and tabbed active/removed views.
frontend/src/pages/shop/AdminDashboardPa: Dashboard showing approval counts, products, listings, and actions to approve or reject users.
frontend/src/pages/shop/CartPage.tsx: Shopping cart UI allowing item quantity updates, removal, subtotal display, and cart clearing.
frontend/src/pages/shop/CataloguePage.ts: Displays a browsable product catalogue with search, product filtering, and add‑to‑cart functionality.
frontend/src/pages/shop/CheckoutPage.tsx: Implements checkout flow including delivery options, payment selection, order submission, and success state handling.
frontend/src/pages/shop/DriverDashboardP: Empty file with no implemented UI or logic.
frontend/src/pages/shop/JoinUsPage.tsx: Shows informational cards for driver, shopper, and pickup‑point roles with disabled application buttons and navigation to application status.
frontend/src/pages/shop/MasterAdminRoleA: Empty file with no implemented UI or logic.
frontend/src/pages/shop/MyOrdersPage.tsx: Lists customer orders with statuses, totals, and navigation to detailed order views, including loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/shop/MyTownsPage.tsx: Displays a user's towns and provides a form to apply for additional towns, with backend‑not‑implemented notice.
Shows detailed order information including status, delivery method, payment method, and item breakdown with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/shop/ProductDetailPag: Empty file with no implemented UI or logic.
frontend/src/pages/shop/ProvinceListPage: Landing page with hero section and feature cards introducing the platform and encouraging user onboarding.
frontend/src/pages/shop/RequestNewProduc: Empty placeholder file for a product request page.
frontend/src/pages/shop/RetailerCatalogP: Empty placeholder file for a retailer catalog page.
frontend/src/pages/shop/RetailerDashboar: Retailer dashboard showing retailer info, inventory stats, and listing statuses with error and loading states.
frontend/src/pages/shop/RetailerListPage: Empty placeholder file for a retailer list page.
frontend/src/pages/shop/RetailerOrderTra: Retailer order tracking page displaying order statuses, tables, and navigation with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/shop/RoleApplications: Page showing stubbed role application tracking with prompt to apply if none exist.
frontend/src/pages/shop/ShopperDashboard: Empty placeholder file for a shopper dashboard page.
frontend/src/pages/shop/TownSuburbListPa: Empty placeholder file for a town/suburb list page.
frontend/src/router/HashRouter.tsx: Custom hash-based router mapping URL paths to pages with auth and admin guards.
frontend/src/utils/externalBlobUrl.ts: Utility to safely extract direct URLs from ExternalBlob objects with error handling.
frontend/src/utils/money.ts: Money utilities for formatting, parsing, and validating ZAR amounts.
frontend/src/utils/productImages.ts: Helpers for selecting primary images, listing product images, checking limits, and generating safe URLs.
frontend/src/utils/publicAssetUrl.ts: Build-safe helper for constructing public asset URLs respecting Vite BASE_URL.
frontend/src/utils/saProvinces.ts: List of South African provinces with a corresponding type.
frontend/src/utils/themeAssets.ts: Theme asset definitions using publicAssetUrl for logo and hero images.
frontend/src/utils/time.ts: Time utilities converting IC nanosecond timestamps to readable date and date-time strings.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions to read URL parameters (including hash routing), persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them from storage or the hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme tokens, colors, animations, and enabling typography, container queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Project state file describing the listings module goals, architecture notes, known issues, and feature definitions for admin, shopper, and checkout integrations.
